name: kidplan-downloader
description: Desktop app for downloading Kidplan kindergarten photo albums

scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm run release:github
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm run release:github
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm run release:github
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm run release:github
